name: 2D Space Shooter (Screexter)
description:
This game includes a fully controllable space ship, a fully interactive menu, 4 customized levels including a final boss battle, a soundtrack and a inmersive background.

Modifications:

1) One more level

2)Different structures of progressivley more difficult enemies

3) A final boss battle with a high health enemy

Credits:

Created by Jaime Díez-Hochleitner Suárez
